participant_1.background:
I live in a large house with a lot of land to keep me busy on the weekends.
I like the weather when it's warm enough to walk on the beach, but not so warm that I get too hot.
I am passionate and determined, even when faced with difficulties.
I am a self-motivated and reliable worker who is looking for a position where I can use my skills and experience to make a positive impact on the company.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

participant_2.background:
I am comfortable with my own style and don't mind being different.
I like to wear the same pants every day so I don't have to think about what to wear.
Monkeys are my favorite animal because they are so smart and playful.
my hair is brown and curly.
I spend my days working as a software engineer and watching makeup tutorials in my spare time, while also trying to find common ground with my father.

content.text: Doing great, thanks for asking!  How about you?
Same here!  I'm currently getting my house ready to list for sale.  It's a big house with a lot of land, so it's been a lot of work!
Oh wow, that sounds like a lot of work!  But also very exciting!  I'm sure it will be a great selling point.  What made you decide to sell?
I'm moving to a smaller house closer to work.  I'm looking forward to being closer to my friends and family, and having a shorter commute.
That makes sense!  Shorter commutes are always nice.  Do you have any pets that you'll be taking with you?
Yes, I have two dogs and a cat.  I'm excited to see how they adjust to the new house.
I'm sure they'll love it!  Dogs and cats love new places to explore.
Me too!  I'm sure they'll have a blast running around the yard.
That's great!  I'm happy for you and your pets.
